mapper.select: SELECT detail_review.review_num, detail_review.user_id, detail_review.content, detail_review.product_num, detail_review.createDt, detail_review.img_path, detail_review.score, detail_review.like_count, user.user_id, noise_review.n_review_msg, packaging_review.p_review_msg, delivery_review.d_review_msg, spec_review.s_review_msg FROM detail_review JOIN user ON detail_review.user_id = user.user_id JOIN simple_review ON detail_review.review_num = simple_review.review_num JOIN noise_review ON simple_review.n_review_num = noise_review.n_review_num JOIN delivery_review ON simple_review.d_review_num = delivery_review.d_review_num JOIN packaging_review ON simple_review.p_review_num = packaging_review.p_review_num JOIN spec_review ON simple_review.s_review_num = spec_review.s_review_num;
